full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN 'PHAGS MA SGROL MA RTEN NAS BU'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYA TSUL RIN CHEN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN BU'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYA TSUL RIN CHEN LCAGS KYU ZHES PA 'DI, DZA HA CHEN GUNG HU THOG THA BA THA DNGUL MAndAL KHA DOG DANG BCAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR BU 'DOD PA NI BU THOB 'GYUR ZHING ZHES GZHUNG YOD PA'I PHYIR, @017B AEL DGOG BSANGS HU THOG THA MER GEN PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI NOM CHI THO YON GU SHRI SLOB DPON BLO BZANG RGYAL MCHOG GO, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA DANG 'GRO BA RNAMS KYIS GNAS SKABS SU DGOS 'DOD RE BA 'GRUB CING MTHAR THUG SANGS RGYAS GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB GYUR CIG , ,,)
